TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdamRoleCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase

Docs.summary: The AdamRoleCollection class is a read-only collection that contains <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"> items.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The AdamRoleCollection class refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole role) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"> item to search for in this collection.
Docs.summary: Determines if the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"> item is in this collection.
Docs.returns: `true` if the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"> item is in this collection; otherwise, `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole[] roles, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole[] roles, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The array of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"> items that receives the elements of this collection.
The zero-based index in where this method starts copying this collection.
Docs.summary: Copies all <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"> items in this collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index of the target array.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 IndexOf(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole role) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"> item to search for in this collection.
Docs.summary: Returns the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"> item in this collection.
Docs.returns: The zero-based index of the first matching item. -1 if no member of this collection is identical to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"> item.

Docs.param: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"> object to get.
Docs.summary: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"> item in this collection.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole"> object that exists at the specified index.
